data.comment: The big names in today's match at Stadio Marcantonio Bentegodi have now been confirmed.
The first-half is just kicking off.
In the minute 1, Daniele Chiffi signals a free kick to Sassuolo in their own half.
Giacomo Raspadori (Sassuolo) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Daniele Chiffi awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 4, Corner awarded to Sassuolo.
Throw-in for Hellas Verona in their own half.
Hellas Verona to take a throw-in in Sassuolo territory.
In the minute 6, Ivan Ilic (Hellas Verona) gets in a great strike – straight into the post! Ohhhh so close!
Hellas Verona have a dangerous throw-in.
Free kick for Sassuolo in their own half.
In the minute 6, Sassuolo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Sassuolo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Hellas Verona awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 9, Throw-in for Hellas Verona in the half of Sassuolo.
Ball safe as Sassuolo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Sassuolo at Stadio Marcantonio Bentegodi.
In the minute 11, Throw-in Sassuolo.
Daniele Chiffi signals a free kick to Hellas Verona in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Sassuolo in Verona.
In the minute 12, Daniele Chiffi awards the home team a throw-in.
Daniele Chiffi signals a free kick to Sassuolo.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Verona.
In the minute 15, Samuel Di Carmine's header is off-target for Hellas Verona.
Ball goes out of play for a Sassuolo goal kick.
Samuel Di Carmine is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
In the minute 16, Samuel Di Carmine has recovered and rejoins the match in Verona.
Daniele Chiffi signals a Hellas Verona throw-in in Sassuolo's half.
Ball safe as Sassuolo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 18, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Daniele Chiffi awards Sassuolo a goal kick.
Free kick for Sassuolo in their own half.
In the minute 19, In Verona Sassuolo attack through Jeremie Boga. The finish is off target, however.
Hellas Verona have a goal kick.
Goal kick for Hellas Verona at Stadio Marcantonio Bentegodi.
In the minute 21, Free kick Hellas Verona.
Free kick in a good position for Hellas Verona!
Throw-in for Sassuolo in their own half.
In the minute 24, Throw-in for Sassuolo at Stadio Marcantonio Bentegodi.
Can Sassuolo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Hellas Verona's half?
Hellas Verona awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 25, In Verona, Nikola Kalinic of Hellas Verona is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Daniele Chiffi signals a throw-in for Hellas Verona, close to Sassuolo's area.
Federico Dimarco hits the bar! Nearly a goal there for Hellas Verona.
In the minute 27, Daniele Chiffi signals a free kick to Sassuolo in their own half.
Free kick for Hellas Verona in their own half.
Hellas Verona's Antonin Barak gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 29, Ball goes out of play for a Sassuolo goal kick.
Free kick for Hellas Verona in the half of Sassuolo.
Pawel Dawidowicz for Hellas Verona drives towards goal at Stadio Marcantonio Bentegodi. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 31, Hellas Verona have been awarded a corner by Daniele Chiffi.
Hellas Verona have a goal kick.
In Verona a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 33, Sassuolo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Daniele Chiffi signals a free kick to Hellas Verona in their own half.
At Stadio Marcantonio Bentegodi, Hellas Verona are penalized for being offside.
In the minute 36, Hellas Verona awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in Sassuolo.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Nikola Kalinic.
In the minute 38, Ebrima Colley (Hellas Verona) has replaced the possibly injured Nikola Kalinic at Stadio Marcantonio Bentegodi.
Daniele Chiffi signals a Hellas Verona throw-in in Sassuolo's half.
Hellas Verona push forward at Stadio Marcantonio Bentegodi and Federico Dimarco gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Sassuolo defence.
In the minute 39, Hellas Verona have been awarded a corner by Daniele Chiffi.
Daniele Chiffi awards Sassuolo a goal kick.
Throw-in Sassuolo.
In the minute 40, Throw-in for Sassuolo at Stadio Marcantonio Bentegodi.
Sassuolo's Filip Djuricic gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Hellas Verona defender.
Jeremie Boga is on target to give Sassuolo a 0-1 advantage.
In the minute 42, Domenico Berardi instrumental with a fine assist.
Corner awarded to Hellas Verona.
Goal kick for Sassuolo at Stadio Marcantonio Bentegodi.
In the minute 44, Can Hellas Verona capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Sassuolo's half?
Free kick for Sassuolo in their own half.
Free kick for Sassuolo in their own half.
2 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
The first-half is over.
In the minute 45, Federico Dimarco is booked for the home team.
In the minute 46, The second-half is underway in Verona.
Daniele Chiffi signals a free kick to Sassuolo.
Ebrima Colley for the home team is judged to be offside.
In the minute 47, Manuel Locatelli for Sassuolo gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Verona.
Ball safe as Sassuolo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 49, Sassuolo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Sassuolo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Sassuolo needs to be cautious. Hellas Verona have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 52, It's a goal kick for the away team in Verona.
Throw-in for Hellas Verona close to the penalty box.
In Verona Hellas Verona attack through Samuel Di Carmine. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 53, Sassuolo have a goal kick.
Daniele Chiffi signals a free kick to Sassuolo in their own half.
Sassuolo's Domenico Berardi gets in a shot on goal at Stadio Marcantonio Bentegodi. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 55, Daniele Chiffi signals a free kick to Hellas Verona in their own half.
Maxime Lopez for Sassuolo has been booked by Daniele Chiffi and receives a first yellow card.
Hellas Verona's Ebrima Colley is whistled for offside at Stadio Marcantonio Bentegodi.
In the minute 57, Free kick Hellas Verona.
Hellas Verona are coming forward and Adrien Tameze gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Sassuolo goal kick.
In the minute 60, Hellas Verona awarded a free kick in their own half.
Manuel Locatelli (Sassuolo) has received a yellow card from Daniele Chiffi.
In Verona Hellas Verona's Samuel Di Carmine is caught offside.
In the minute 62, Throw-in for Sassuolo in their own half.
Free kick for Hellas Verona in the half of Sassuolo.
The away team have replaced Jeremy Toljan with Kaan Ayhan. This is the first substitution made today by Roberto De Zerbi.
In the minute 65, Important block from the Sassuolo defence as Ebrima Colley fires in a strike for Hellas Verona.
Can Hellas Verona get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sassuolo's half?
Free kick for Sassuolo in their own half.
In the minute 68, Miguel Veloso is replacing Ivan Ilic for Hellas Verona at Stadio Marcantonio Bentegodi.
Hellas Verona make their third substitution with Iyenoma Destiny Udogie replacing Federico Ceccherini.
Daniele Chiffi awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 69, In Verona a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Manuel Locatelli of Sassuolo gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Hellas Verona at Stadio Marcantonio Bentegodi.
In the minute 72, Hellas Verona have been awarded a corner by Daniele Chiffi.
Sassuolo's Vlad Chiriches misses with an attempt on goal.
Daniele Chiffi awards Hellas Verona a goal kick.
In the minute 73, Hamed Junior Traore is on a sub for Filip Djuricic for Sassuolo.
Roberto De Zerbi is making the team's third substitution at Stadio Marcantonio Bentegodi with Mert Muldur replacing Giacomo Raspadori.
Sassuolo's Domenico Berardi gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Hellas Verona defender.
Great finish from Domenico Berardi to give Sassuolo a 0-2 lead.
In the minute 75, That's a fine assist from Jeremie Boga.
Hellas Verona's Ebrima Colley has run offside.
In the minute 77, Can Hellas Verona capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Eddie Salcedo is replacing Samuel Di Carmine for the home team.
Miguel Veloso hits the post! Very nearly a goal there in Verona for Hellas Verona.
In the minute 79, Ball goes out of play for a Sassuolo goal kick.
The away team replace Jeremie Boga with Marlon.
In the minute 80, Hellas Verona awarded a free kick in their own half.
Sassuolo make their fifth substitution with Pedro Obiang replacing Maxime Lopez.
Hellas Verona to take a throw-in in Sassuolo territory.
Corner awarded to Hellas Verona.
In the minute 83, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Hellas Verona in the half of Sassuolo.
Mattia Zaccagni (Hellas Verona) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 86, Eddie Salcedo (Hellas Verona) strikes at Stadio Marcantonio Bentegodi but his header is cleared.
Throw-in for Hellas Verona in the half of Sassuolo.
Sassuolo's Hamed Junior Traore is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 87, Free kick Hellas Verona.
Throw-in for Sassuolo in their own half.
Ball safe as Sassuolo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 88, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Verona.
Hellas Verona push forward at Stadio Marcantonio Bentegodi and Eddie Salcedo gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Sassuolo defence.
In the minute 89, Hellas Verona have been awarded a corner by Daniele Chiffi.
Daniele Chiffi signals a free kick to Hellas Verona.
Hellas Verona advance rapidly upfield but Daniele Chiffi blows for offside.
At Stadio Marcantonio Bentegodi the fourth official shows that 3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Hellas Verona pushes forward through Eddie Salcedo, whose finish on goal is saved.
Throw-in for Hellas Verona in the half of Sassuolo.
Important block from the Sassuolo defence as Adrien Tameze fires in a strike for Hellas Verona.
In Verona a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Iyenoma Destiny Udogie (Hellas Verona) strikes – and hits the bar! Ohhhh so close!
Goal kick for Sassuolo at Stadio Marcantonio Bentegodi.
The match has come to a close in Verona. The final score is 0-2.
At Stadio Marcantonio Bentegodi, Marlon has been yellow-carded for the away team.
